about_the_game:
Overview

In the city of Sodom, as night descends, an unprecedented robot revolution quietly erupts. At 6 PM tonight, industrial robots, security guards, and even household companions—once loyal to humans—suddenly break free from their programmed restraints, transforming into a wave of rebellion that sweeps through the entire city. Over 300 mechanical entities rise up with an unstoppable force, challenging humanity's dominance.

You are Alice, a specially tasked enforcement robot, stepping into this chaotic battlefield of conflict and fire. Your mission is not only to quell the uprising but also to uncover the shocking truths hidden behind the mechanical rebellion. In this battle between humans and machines, control and freedom, what will be your choice?

Sodom, once a city of glory, has now become a breeding ground for desire and sin. Is human indulgence and greed the spark that ignited this robot uprising? And in this historical upheaval, what role will you, Alice, play?

Armed with weapons, step into the battlefield and engage in intense combat against the rebellious robots. In this TPS shooting game adventure, experience the thrill of mechanical heartbeats and explore the boundaries of freedom and constraint. Under the night sky of Sodom, a legend of intelligence, courage, and freedom awaits you to write.

Features

Third-Person Shooting and Roguelike Elements Merged

In Cyber Loop, you'll experience a unique blend of intense third-person shooting and unpredictable roguelike elements. Each session offers a new adventure, unexpected challenges, and unforeseen outcomes.

Extensive Arsenal, Over 60 Weapons to Choose From

From classic assault rifles and pistols to futuristic plasma cannons and laser guns, our arsenal includes over 60 different weapons. Each weapon has its own distinct performance and characteristics, allowing players to mix and match based on their tactical preferences, creating a personalized combat style.

Randomly Generated Monster Hordes, Infinite Variations

In this unpredictable world, enemies are diverse and unpredictable. The game features a wide variety of monsters, and each encounter is uniquely generated, ensuring that no two battles are the same. This tests not only your reflexes but also your ability to adapt strategies to the ever-changing battlefield.

Epic Boss Battles, Pushing You to the Limit

Face off against formidable bosses that demand your utmost effort. These massive mechanical creatures have complex behavior patterns and devastating attack methods, challenging both your skills and mental fortitude. Defeating a boss rewards you with rare items and unlocks new abilities, preparing you for future battles.

Join us and witness the grand epic of this robot revolution, unravel the secrets of Sodom, and feel the deep cries and aspirations of every mechanical soul. Here, you are not just a player; you are a witness and participant in this historic transformation. Are you ready for this unparalleled challenge?
